title: I am getting 404 when accessing http://localhost:7101/wcoe-solr/admin
description:
I deployed solr.war successfully in weblogic 9
I got the welcome page when i access http://localhost:7101/wcoe-solr/
But it gives 404 error, when i access the admin "http://localhost:7101/wcoe-solr/admin"

Please help

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content: Is this still a problem? This is probably better raised on the user's list before making this a JIRA.

comments.author: Stefan Matheis (steffkes)
comments.content: Given the fact that this issue was opened Sep '12 w/o further feedback since then, i'm going to close this.
